text: Hey all! I’m Dina. I’m a full stack developer for a digital marketing agency in Indianapolis.  I have been working within HubSpot for the last 3 years or so and have spent a good amount of time finding the best ways to leverage HubSpot to produce highly flexible, modular templates for both web pages and emails.
Excited to have you in the slack <@UJAPS2K4N> - Really happy to hear you're already very active in the forum - hope this slack is helpful to you as well. :slightly_smiling_face:
Welcome to the party :tada: <@UJ901EHPE> - Really excited to have you in the slack. Appreciate all your hard work in the :sprocket:HubSpot CMS dev world the last few years. :slightly_smiling_face:
Excited to be a part of it and share all that I have learned and figured out!
Thanks for the invitation, <@U22PKFRU5> . I'm excited as well and looking forward for the cool stuff :grin:
